definition: metropolitan examination (imperial civil service examination)
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to test/to try/experiment/examination/test

sentences.english: There would be artists, of course, who would try topaint this scene.
sentences.chinese: 那里会有艺术家，当然，谁会试着画这样一幅景。

sentences.english: You can contact me by clicking this link and I will try to help.
sentences.chinese: 你能点击这个链接联系我，我会试着去帮你。

sentences.english: I will try to distill this research in the theory-discussion sessions.
sentences.chinese: 我会试著在这学期的理论讨论中提出研究的精华。

sentences.english: Sure, in two weeks, we did try to improvise some things.
sentences.chinese: 当然，在两周内，我们会试着去想出一些片段。

sentences.english: What I do is try to sing the bass.
sentences.chinese: 我的话会试着跟唱低音部。

sentences.english: People have got to try and put a value on players which they think is fair.
sentences.chinese: 人们会试着签下自己认为价钱合适的球员。

sentences.english: During the Lantern Festival, people will try to solve the puzzles on the lanterns and eat yuanxiao (glutinous rice ball).
sentences.chinese: 在元宵节期间，人们会试着猜灯谜，吃汤圆。

sentences.english: I'll try sending it out again.
But I will re-try her again for her figure and reasonable services.
sentences.chinese: 但重我会试她再次为她图和合理的服务。

sentences.english: We're just going to try and improve it from there.
sentences.chinese: 我们将会试着从中提升它的功能。

sentences.english: Generally, all of the gongshis would be reexamined.
sentences.chinese: 会试后一般要举行复试。

sentences.english: I'll try putting those in. How do you feel about the text?
sentences.chinese: 我会试着放一些上去，你觉的这些配文怎么样？

sentences.english: That's when I try to meditate or do some deep -breathing exercises.
sentences.chinese: 这时我就会试着沉思或者做些深呼吸练习。

sentences.english: I'll have a shot at the puzzle.
On Saturday, he would be out in the driveway all day, bent over the Galaxie, making adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 周六，他会试车一整日，调整“银河号”。

sentences.english: He'll try to attract your attention.
sentences.chinese: 他会试着吸引你的注意力。

definition: the triennial provincial imperial exam during the Ming and Qing
court examination, the top grade imperial exam
prefectural exam, the 2nd of the three entry-level exams in the imperial examination system of Ming and Qing dynasties
autumn exam (triennial provincial exam during Ming and Qing)
metropolitan civil service examination (held triennially in spring in imperial times)/Crown Prince's chambers/by extension, the Crown Prince
(old) candidate who has successfully passed the first grades of the examination system, but not yet the court examination (殿試|殿试[dian4 shi4])
the last of the three entry-level exams in the imperial examination system of Ming and Qing dynasties
to pass an exam
title of the temporary position in the Hanlin Academy, conferred to meritorious candidates until the next examination
successful candidate in the highest imperial civil service examination/palace graduate
court examination, the top grade imperial exam
successful military candidate in the imperial provincial examination
autumn exam (triennial provincial exam during Ming and Qing)
graduate/successful candidate in the imperial provincial examination
imperial examination
imperial examinations (in former times)
